name: Pandaros.Settlers
about: The Settlers mod adds over 100 new researchables, 100's of new blocks, Weapons, Armor, Knights, Machines, teleporters, builders wand, magic items, new jobs and of course Settlers!

notes: Fixed stone slab name
Fixed bug where colonists would be hurt after researching colonist health
Mining machines no longer mine faster. They are still more efficient than manual as you can have 4-5 mining machines per Machinist
Added the ability to build minecraft schematics with the schematic tool
Added schematic tool research, requires builders.
Added the ability so save schematics. they save on a per colony and player basis.
Added in game help menu
Added Magic Items
Added Sorcerer Job - creates magic items
Added Colony management too to manage your colonists Jobs.
Added Mana system. System includes, pipes, pumps tanks and magical mana consuming blocks
Mana tanks reflect how much mana then have in them visually
Added Connected block system. This is similar to Minecrafts fence, stair, redstone, etc.. system where bocks change based on blocks placed next to them
Added train system
Added new monster types. These have elemental resitances
Added Happiness cause that will lower happiness when beds are too close
Added Happiness cause that will lower happiness for a duration based on difficulty when a colonist dies/leaves the colony
Added Happiness cause that will lower happiness when there are not enough beds for colonists
Added Happiness cause that will lower happiness when there are not enough jobs for colonists
Added Happiness cause that will make guards attack slower if happiness is too low
Added Stats for each colonists in the Colony management tool
Added serveral new ore layers including new magical ores from layers 40-42
Added antigrief for players who are not in your colony.
Added prompt to accept or reject new settlers. Settlers no longer auto join your colony.
Added setting for prompt of settlers, Auto Accept, Prompt, Disabled
Added Connected block system expandable by JSON for modders. This is similar to the way minecraft auto connects stairs, pipes and track.
Added Artificer. Creates Mana Tanks, Pipes, Pumps along with some magical machines! Artificer Also Maintains these machines similar to Machinists
Added Train System. You can add stops to the trains. These trains run on mana from the Artificer job. The trains automatically go round and each stop must be worked by a colonist.
Added Mana Machine that Increases Guard damage (10%)
Added Mana Machine that Monster AoE Damage 10 per 5/sec, 4 block each direction (advanced)
Added Mana Machine that Invisible wall (5x2) rotatable (normal blocks, just invisible)
Added Mana Machine that +2% Luck 4 blocks each direction (Luck in settlers is used for crit chance and bonus item procs (bonus items are rare items sometimes crafted with settlers items)
Added Mana Machine that Happiness Generator (Colonists are hypnotized by its beauty) +10 happiness while running. (Advanced)
Added Elemental zombies that spawn, these will spawn as your colony grows in addition to the normal zombies.
Added Loot tables
Bosses now start randomly spawning after 100 colonists. Up from 15.
Machinists now have a day and night job.
Knights now have a wait mode that will wait for monsters to come to them while patrolling
Knights now sleep durning the day
Bosses now only spawn during the Night
Slabs, Fence, Iron bar and doors now have proper colliders
Call to arms will use equipt swords now
Colonists will now puch zombies when they come close to them. Its configured as ColonistPunchDamage and defaults to 30 damage
Swords will auto equit to colonists now but always leave at least 4 in the stockpile. This is similar to armor
Added serveral new ores that generate in the map: Adamantine, Emerald, Ruby, Saphire
GREATLY expanded settlers extentions, allowing other mod makers to use the settlers systems and adding to them

Things that can be extended: Bosses, Armor, Weapons, Magic Items, Recipes, Texture Mapping, Multi-Tier Science, Help Menu, Roaming Job, Ore Generation, Connected Blocks, Monsters, Machines, Magical Blocks, Connected blocks
Fixed monsters spawning like CRAZY
Fixed bosses not spawning
When colonists leave they now tell you what they are taking
There is now a penalty on top of seige mode for bosses unable to get to your banner.
Fixed monsters on|off command
Added 0.6.2.0 support
Added player configurations to the banners settings menu
Fixed some blocks not having any texture. this should be all of them fixed now.
Fixed sounds not working
Fixed some blocks not having any texture. There are still more that are broken at this time.
Fixed More Linux pathing
Fixed some items not able to be crafted.
Nefed the reduced waste research
Gates now close when bosses spawn
Fixed Linux pathing
Fixed rotatable blocks
Added machine types in the code for extendability.
Fixed mod items not in shop.
Fixed lava
Fixed Icons and texture mappings.
Added Mod extensions. These are addons to the Settlers core engines. Made for optional additions. Mod makers see the Wiki for more details.
6.1.0 Colony Survival support
Cost of Mana, Aether, elementum have their reliance on herbs reduced. But, the cost of other reagents increased
Chance of getting Void from a elementium craft has been increased.
Fixed slabs so you can walk on them again as stairs.
Configurations can now be set in game with the /settlersconfig *SETTING* *VALUE* command
Added Permissions to some commands
Fixed cases where turrets would not shoot.
Fallen Rangers range reduced by half
Fallen Ranger now shoots players. Players are prioritized over Colonists.
Fallen Ranger now respects line of sight.
Turrets now respect line of sight.
Fixed compounding cost of recruiting settlers not resetting.
Settlers will now properly leave after 1 in game week of having no job or bed
The number of settlers that join your colonoy after a wipe is now displayed accurately. Note: There is a HARD max of 30 settlers.
Fixed Elemental Turret ammo running out after 2 shots. it now lasts 50 shots per 2 stones. 50 shots per 1 void stone.

Buying colonists no longer costs a % of your food but now a compounding 5 additional food per colonist bought. Example: the first colonist will cost 50, second 55, third 60, ect... This resets after 24 in game hours of not buying any colonists. A message will be displayed when it has reset.
Fallen rangers damage and ranged attack speed have been halved.
Number of craftable stones by default lowered from 50 to 6.
Reduced the bonus HP to zombies from 150 hp to 50 hp.
Number of zombies that are spawned from Hoarder has been reduced.
Added decorative category to the carpet blocks.
The settlers message will no longer appear if you did not random any.
Bosses come at random now instead of round robin. The same boss cannot spawn twice in a row.
Settlers now come a little more often but there are less settlers.
Removed copper coin requirement from researching copper armor.
Lowered the cost of elemental turret cost of 5 elemental stones to 2.
Void turrets now cost 1 elemental stone to create and 1 to fuel.
Fixed Time Between Settlers research to have the proper dependancies.
Settlers now come a little more often but there are less settlers.
Fixed duplicate colonists being addded when Settlers come.
Fixed bug where Settlers take a while to come after closing and re-opening a world.
Fixed settler count properly updating after a colonist laves.
Fixed settler count properly updating after colonists join your colony.
Fixed offline colonies not proplery saving saving colonists jobs.
Armor, difficulty damage reduction and elemental resistances are now properly applied on hit.
Right clicking on a berry bush now gives you 2 berries to help you recover from a wipe of your colonists early game.
Fix zombies not spawning when a player has over 500 colonists.
Fixed Max Settlers that can come at a single time
Updated the tooltips for Mana and Elementium to note their rare drops.
Fix settlers coming too often.
Fix /settlers off not working.
Fixed error with settlers after skilled workers are researched.
Fix settlers coming too often after reduced time is researched.
Fixed Knights unable to get weapons or armor.
Zombies can now be disabled with the /monsters [off|on] command.
Bosses no longer have max HP. They will scale fully based on difficulty and number of colonists.
New research added: Elementium, craftable by the Apothecary. Elementium is the base metal for magical items and stones.
New elemental stones added for magic: Earth, Air, Fire, Water and Void, these are used as reagents and ammo for magic attacks.
Settlers are back! Along with their original researchables; Max Settlers, Min Settlers, Time Between
Added Skilled labor researchables. Skilled labor add additional chance for rare items to be crafted. (most rare items are a by-product of a item being crafted with a drop rate of 3% base)
Added Elemental Turrets.
Bosses now have different elemental armors along with additional physical resistance.
Zombies base HP will now scale with colonies that are larger than 500 colonists.
Knight base damage reduction increased from 65% to 75%.
Added items to /lootall command.
Turrets now shoot slower than normal guards, but continue to do the same amount of damage.
Bosses that move slower have had their HP buffed 25%.
Zombie Queen now teleports one less monster. The number of monsters teleported is based on difficulty. For example: Medium went from 3 to 2 monsters per teleport cooldown.
3 new bosses added: Fallen Ranger: Has a ranged bow attack. Jack-b-nimble: super fast! Phase: Attacks vs phase have a chance to miss.
New Epic bosses. Spawn after your colony reaches 500 colonists.  Void Knight: Void armored, has lance that can reach 2 blocks that is laced with void damage. Void Mage: AoE Void fire attacks.
Fixed monster spawner. No longer spawns twice as many zombies during bosses.
Bosses will no longer die if you block their path. They will teleport to the next valid position in their path to prevent cheesing bosses via path blocking.
Fixed bug where turrets would not shoot from all sides.
Fixed bug where builders wand could not build on one side in horizontal mode.
Removed food from auto load. This includes: carrot, egg, flour, milk, meat and cake.
